full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB CHEN THANG STONG RGYAL PO'I RDO RJE'I GSUM LA SKYA NANG GROL MAR GRAGS PA'I SMON LAM BYIN RLABS CAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES MDO KHAMS ME NYAG GI YUL DU GA-YUL 'KHRUGS RGYUN MI 'CHANG BA SUS KYANG 'DUM PAR MA NUS PA'I TSE, ,RJE GRUB THOB CHEN PO PHYOGS DER PHABS NAS THUGS BSKYED MDZAD, ,BDEN TSIG GSUNGS SHING MI TOG 'THOR BA TZAM KYIS THAMS CAD KYI PHRAG DOG ,DANG ZHES SDANG GI GDUG SEMS THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING GA-YUL 'KHRUGS RGYUN CHAD, ,LO LEGS SKYA RGYAL SOGS BKRA SHIS PHUN GSUM TSOGS PA BYUNG BA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG BYIN RLABS CAN NO,, ,,)
